version_description:
We at Voot are constantly trying to improve your experience. Keep Updating to get the best of Voot.

- iPad Compatibility
- Various bug fixes
- General app stability

We at Voot are constantly trying to improve your experience. Keep Updating to get the best of Voot.

- Various bug fixes
- General app stability

- New player to keep your video experience snappy
- Bugs squashed, so you don’t have to
- Under the hood performance improvements

Made it a little easier to access Voot Kids faster

Bug fixes

General housekeeping

Made it a little easier to access Voot Kids faster.
Bug fixes.
General housekeeping.

+ Introduced a new 360 player for special content on Khatron Ke Khiladi
+ Made under the hood improvements based on your feedback & suggestions
+ Fixed a bunch of bugs as we always do & will continue to
Bug fixes & under the hood performance improvements.

- Exciting new features Bigg Boss 11.
- Behind the scenes integrations for Bigg Boss voting.
- Bug fixes & general tidiness.

Good feedback is always welcome. Please write to support@voot.com for any comments or suggestions.
Bug fixes & general housekeeping.

We've introduced 'Pull to Refresh' -- For all those times you can't wait to see what's new.

Bug Fixes & App Optimizations to keep things snappy.

You asked for it and we delivered. We have now added subtitles to your favourite shows. Enjoy the enhanced experience.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

-Search optimization.
-Bug fixes & general tidiness.

Good feedback is always welcome. Please write to support@voot.com for any comments or suggestions.

•Downloads is finally here! Watch your favourite content offline with our new downloads feature.
•Simplified new user onboarding – it’s now simpler & gets you going faster.
•Support for the new iPhone X.
•Bug fixes & general housekeeping.
Bug fixes & general housekeeping.
Bug fixes and general house keeping.

Your favourite Voot Kids now available in multiple audio languages. Change to experience the magic!

Access all updates from your Favourites without leaving the Favourites section.

As always, we’ve fixed bugs and making performance improvements for the best possible Voot experience.

We've introduced 'Pull to Refresh' -- For all those times you can't wait to see what's new.

Bug Fixes & App Optimizations to keep things snappy.
- Bug Fixes, performance improvements and general house keeping.
-Bug fixes, performance improvements and general house keeping.
-Bug fixes, performance improvements and general house keeping.

-In-app voice search so there's lesser for you to do to get to your favourite shows.
-Improved image caching for a snappier experience.
-Updates to Chromecast for that seamless big screen experience.
-General housekeeping & bug fixes.

Live News: Voot now brings you live & breaking news from latest & best of Networks 18s highly rated News channels.

Bug Fixes & performance optimization for a smoother & error free video experience.

It’s that time of the year again! Since we cannot do with our favourite (new) season of Bigg Boss:
•Interact with the year’s biggest show in more ways than just watching it through audience interactivity in the app.
•We’ve made some UI improvements & changes that make things easier to use & more pleasing to the eyes.
•We always do our housekeeping and ensure there are fewer bugs and a snappier experience with each app version.

"We've been listening to you and have introduced the most requested feature

•Continue Watching! Now pick up each video where you left it and manage your own list of partially watched content.

•Support for OS 12.

•We've also made some behind the scenes upgrades and optimisations to make your experience snappier & less buggy."

This update is a labor of our love for you #AsliFans and our mutual love for #NonStopNew entertainment. (Also, a labor of incessant coffee inflow and lots of night-outs with bugs.)

Jokes aside (or not), we've worked on a host of improvements to enhance your Voot experience. Your videos should load faster, buffer lesser, and you'll be able to pick from video quality options complete with info on data usage. We know we have a long way to go so please be an #AsliFan and share your feedback.
